TITLE: :wrench: Leave system :
DESCRIPTION: If it doesn't work, check the bot permissions or join our [support server]({{discord}})
ENABLED_YES_CONTENT: {{success}} Leave messages enabled. Disable them with `{{prefix}}setleave`.
ENABLED_NO_CONTENT: {{error}} Leave messages disabled. Enable them with `{{prefix}}setleave`.
CHANNEL_CONTENT: No channel defined. Set it with `{{prefix}}configleave`!
MESSAGE_CONTENT: No message defined. Set it with `{{prefix}}configleave`!
